data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word دَنَا comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: (Dal-Lam-Alif) To let down (e.g. a bucket into a well), to lower, a bucket.
data.sentence: The word فَتَدَلَّى comes from the root د ل و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Lam-Alif) To let down (e.g. a bucket into a well), to lower, a bucket.
